actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code (relating to Government organization and employees) to assist Federal employees in meeting their tax obligations under city ordinances.

summary.text: Authorizes the Civil Service Commission to enter into an agreement regarding the withholding of city income or employment taxes, within 120 days of a request for agreement by the proper city official. Forbids Federal agencies from accepting compensation from a city for services of withholding taxes. Defines "city" to mean only a city which is incorporated.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code (relating to Government organization and employees) to assist Federal employees in meeting their tax obligations under city ordinances.
